name: Farmer And Tree
description:
Conquer barren mountain, plant trees and enjoy the farmer's life!



ψ (` ∇ ´) ψ Welcome to my place!

Farmer And Tree is a real time story game with science and zen element. You will see how the mountain being developed.

The plants and trees will be developed even when you’re not around. Launch the game and check your mail box. Sometimes, you will receive some letters read them to push the story forward. You may also receive some hand drawing postcards from an unknown artist. Let’s collecting them.



You will be adopting a barren mountain, see how the plants grow, watch the sunrises and the sunsets. And also unlock a story on the mountain.

【🌱A zen life】

A seed will tell you a story.
On the mountain, everything is going to be continued even when you’re not around. When the next time you open the game, you will receive new cards and stories. Enjoy a peaceful and relaxing world.

【🌱Real time story】

The story starts from the day of spring equinox…
Receive the letters weekly to push the story forwards. From barren to a vigorous, from one man to a group of people…

【🌱Encounter animal friends】

New friends and letters will be unlocked by how many types of the trees you have planted and how many cards you have collected.

【🌱10 types of trees in each season】

Observe cards to win the seeds! Let’s plant new trees!
There’re 10 type of seeds In each season! And dozens of cards waiting for you to collected.
Get knowing each types of trees, from unfamiliar to familiar, be a good tree neighbor, be happy with tree neighbors.



More details are waiting for you to discover!

press “Tab” to full screen.
